Pokemon being one of several new custom gametypes knocked together by intrepid Halo players using the Forge map editor's new AI toolkit, added in the Halo Season 5: Reckoning updates, which allow you to bring campaign AI into Forge maps and tweak its behaviour at length. I choose you, Master Chief!
Read more
articles.title: Halo Infinite is exciting again, as players use new AI Forge tools to build Halo MOBAs and Pokemon arenas

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Following three years solely on the Epic Games Store, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2’s recent Steam launch was a largely happy occasion – save for it carrying over the same always-online requirement as it has on Epic. Yesterday’s 1.1 patch for the Steam version has now made offline play possible, but in a move that simultaneously makes loads of and absolutely no sense, it’s only available on the Steam Deck.

 
Read more
articles.title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 drops the always-online requirement, but only for Steam Deck

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
Flour, egg, banana, butter, salt. Given the ingredients at hand, I thought this was a decent attempt at making banana bread. The free cooking game Little Chef disagreed, and dubbed my dish 'Eggy Mess'. Everyone's a critic. But it's fun to puzzle out potential recipes, dragging ingredients into the pot, brushing my cursor against little physics-simulated spoons and plant fronds, and discovering what fresh horror I've concocted. It's free and playable in your browser, so hie thee to Itch.io and get experimenting.
Read more
articles.title: Discover how to cook delicious and disgusting dishes in this cute browser game

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Immersive sims like Dishonored or System Shock can be very fulfilling, but they are also oddly stressful. After all, the flipside of the genre mantra of solving problems through imaginative application of the tools is that when you achieve a boring solution, that's all your fault. Did you miss the final jump while trying for a complex, third-storey infiltration in Deathloop, resulting in a sadly non-immersive firefight in the courtyard below? Did you fail to combo those magical abilities and terrain variables as the developers hoped - nay, dreamed you would, forcing you to rely on ye olde cover-shoot tactics to reach the checkpoint? Shame on you! Don't you know how much imsims cost to develop? Go back to Open-Ended Systems School and retake that course in The Power of Choice. Also, consider playing Mosa Lina instead. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Mosa Lina is an immersive sim for people who hate the perfectionism of immersive sims

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Building a small form factor PC with the great PC cases I keep writing deals posts about? Need a great SFX-L power supply to go with it? Newegg are currently offering a deal on Corsair's SF1000L, a compact 1000W 80+ Gold rated fully modular power supply - it's down to $150, from $180. 
That's still a lot, but this is quite a fair price for a 1kW PSU from a well-known manufacturer, let alone an SFX-L one as these are often more expensive due to their level of miniaturisation that is required. This basically allows you to use even the most energy-intensive CPUs or GPUs available*. 
Read more
articles.title: This 1000W SFX-L 80+ Gold power supply is down to $150 at Newegg

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
Tiles, they’re just pleasing. Plonk ‘em down, line ‘em up, watch pretty patterns emerge and your score multiply. Upcoming PC game Planetiles is about tiles - they’re right there in the name! - and looks to continue the immensely satisfying chill puzzling of Dorfromantik and its ilk.

 
Read more
articles.title: Planetiles looks like the next chill tile-'em-up for Dorfromantik fans

articles.author: Will Judd
articles.description:
Asus make some of the best gaming laptops going, and their Flow Z13 (discounted today!) is one of the most interesting too. It's an ultraportable 13-inch machine with high-end specs, a 1200p (1920x1200) 120Hz touchscreen and a detchable keyboard. Plug in Asus' discrete GPU (or any other eGPU solution), and you're left with an extremely powerful gaming machine - then unplug and you've got a thin and light laptop for getting work done or consuming media on the go. Nice. 
Anyway, this laptop retailed for $1300 when it first debuted last year, but now it's down to $700 at Woot in the US. That's a substantial savings and a good deal for a 13-inch laptop with a Core i5 12500H CPU, 16GB of DDR5 RAM and a 512GB NVMe SSD. 
Read more
articles.title: Pick up the powerful 13-inch Asus ROG Z13 Flow laptop for $700 after a Woot discount

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
Last time, you narrowly decided that a diegetic HUD is better than quick restarts. That result was a narrow victory—53% vs 47%—which shows how important it is to engage with the formation of scientific consensus. If you disagree with the newly established fact, well, you can't quick-restart your way out of this one. Onwards! This week, I ask you to decide between two different ways your decisions can have unusual outcomes. What's better: present decisions deciding past events, or that puzzle where switches turn on some things while turning off others?
Read more
articles.title: What's better: Present decisions deciding past events, or that puzzle where switches turn on some things while turning off others?

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
It sounds like quite the team of RPG talent is assembling behind upcoming open-world game Wyrdsong, the debut title from newfound studio Something Wicked Games. On top of its existing staff made up of former Bethesda, Obsidian, Respawn and BioWare devs, the lead quest designer for Starfield has joined the team.

 
Read more
articles.title: Starfield’s lead quest designer joins other ex-Bethesda devs - plus Obsidian and BioWare vets - to work on upcoming open-world RPG Wyrdsong

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
Who had ‘playable remake of Alan Wake inside Fortnite’ on their 2023 bingo card? Nobody? Well, nevermind: either way, you can now relive the events of Remedy’s battery-powered horror game before its sequel comes out later this month.

 
Read more
articles.title: Fortnite’s Alan Wake: Flashback is a sort-of-remake-but-not-quite that lets you replay the whole game in 20 minutes before Alan Wake 2

articles.author: Matt Jarvis
articles.description:
Vampire Survivors is the gift that keeps on giving, dropping a local multiplayer mode, flashy new engine and a whole bunch of other free stuff on top of a game that is already more than well worth its modest price tag. In the case of the screen-filling slay-’em-up’s next big update, it’s now a Christmas gift that keeps on giving, with a Santa’s sack worth of winter-inspired additions on the way. Oh, and it all arrives tomorrow. That’s nice.

 
Read more
articles.title: Vampire Survivors’ free winter update lands tomorrow with a chilly new stage, frosty character and a big ol’ Okami fox to fight

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
False alarm! Intel’s big batch of new gaming CPUs for 2023 is not the architectural overhaul known as Meteor Lake. The 14th generation of Core chips is instead codenamed Raptor Lake Refresh, and if the Core i5-14600K and Core i9-14900K are any indication, that comes with an awful lot more emphasis on "Raptor Lake" than on "Refresh."

 
Read more
articles.title: Intel Core i5-14600K and Core i9-14900K review: big numbers, tiny changes

articles.author: Alice Bell
articles.description:
Being as much of an insufferable, online-but-ultimately-in-quite-a-basic-way person as I am, I'm a Junji Ito girlie. The horror manga artist has an immediately recognisable style that intersects detailed, line heavy art with strange and upsetting concepts, and some of his short stories have acquired a sort of semi-memetic status ("This is my hole! It was made for me!"). If you're at all familiar with Junji Ito's work you will look at unforgiving almost-text-adventure World Of Horror and go "Huh, that's inspired by Junji Ito."
This isn't just because it looks like his work but rendered in MSPaint, or because it contains, just, direct references to it, but because of the whole vibe. You encounter face-sloughing-off kinds of monsters and vengeful spirits inspired by Japanese folkloric yokai, but also weirdo janitors doing stuff like turning the swim team into mermaids in a kind of pervier version of Tusk. At the same time, there's a streak of the Lovecraftian in play to keep it nice and legally distinct, as each self-contained run at the titular world is an attempt to save your town from destruction at the hands of an Old God (they earn the leaden thud of the capital letters). You will fail a lot. But isn't failure part of the fun!? Imagine that enthusiastic question as a big spoonful of marmite popped into your mouth.
Read more
articles.title: World Of Horror review: a weird and wonderful horror adventure in time for Halloween

articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.description:
Frontier Developments have announced the fourth and final faction coming to their Warhammer RTS Age Of Sigmar: Realms Of Ruin. The Disciples Of Tzeentch are a clan of magical chaos demons that specialise in long-range attacks, and they'll join the Stormcast Eternals, Orruk Kruleboyz and the Nighthaunt when the game launches on November 17th. 
Read more
articles.title: The final faction in Frontier's Warhammer RTS is magical chaos cult The Disciples Of Tzeentch

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Klasické rotační pevné disky se stále prodávají a mají čile k světu, ale kupují je ještě běžní smrtelníci? Možná se mnou ne všichni budou souhlasit, ale: nejsme už definitivně v post-mechanické éře?
articles.title: SSD neustále zlevňují, terabajt stojí tisícovku a nespolehlivosti se bát nemusíte

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: Není server jako server a v DNS to platí dvojnásob. V hierarchii domén existuje několik různých typů serverů, jejichž role se významně liší. Vysvětlíme si, za co který zodpovídá a jak pracuje.
articles.title: Principy fungování DNS: role různých typů serverů při řešení dotazů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: S projektem Transcrypt popsaným na začátku týdne je velmi úzce spojen projekt nazvaný Numscrypt (Nµmscrλpt). Jedná se o částečnou portaci známé knihovny Numpy do JavaScriptu, takže funkce z Numpy je možné využít v pythonních skriptech.
articles.title: Numscrypt aneb Numpy běžící ve webovém prohlížeči

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Macek)
articles.description: Ať chcete nebo ne, časem se šestce nevyhnete. Internet ji potřebuje pro další rozvoj a po celém světě ji už využívá téměř polovina uživatelů, aniž to tuší. Není to složité, ukážeme si pár příkladů.
articles.title: Základy nasazení IPv6: od získání adres až po síť pro hosty

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si odemkneme zaheslované PDF dokumenty, vyzkoušíme šikovného správce souborů, shlédneme pár seriálů a integrujeme si AppImage do systému.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (25. 10. 2023): odemkněte PDF chráněné heslem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: V dnešním článku se seznámíme s nástrojem Transcrypt, což je další překladač (přesněji řečeno transpřekladač – transpiler) zdrojových kódů z Pythonu do JavaScriptu. Nabízí i celou řadu funkcí ze standardní knihovny Pythonu.
articles.title: Transcrypt: technologie umožňující použití Pythonu v prohlížeči

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description: Pravidelná dávka aktuálních informací z oblasti kybernetické bezpečnosti. Dnes si zkontrolujeme vzdálené velení, pošleme mozek do penze, uklidíme si ve směrovačích a zakousneme se do jablka z druhé strany.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: outsourcing mozku na chatboty

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: openSUSE pracuje na vlastním instalátoru s názvem Agama. Vyšel nejnovější nástroj Raspberry Pi Imager s podporou RPi 5. Lehká linuxová distribuce SparkyLinux navržená pro staré i nové počítače má tři nové edice.
articles.title: openSUSE vyvíjí nový instalátor, SparkyLinuxu má tři edice

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Intel OSPRay 3.0 s GPU akcelerací ray-tracingu, podpora Intel Meteor Lake v Linuxu 6.7, Vulkan 1.3.269 a CUDA/ARM, Mesa 23.3 a podpora Radeonů RDNA3 Refresh, Intel Arc A580 a vysoká spotřeba v klidu.
articles.title: Test Intel Arc A580 na Linuxu, IBM POWER11 v GCC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Generaci procesorů Ivy Bridge uvedl Intel na trh v roce 2012. Dodnes na takové to běžné počítačování stačí, jak ukazuje můj nejnovější přírůstek do stáje, kancelářský stroj od HP.
articles.title: Stařičký stroj HP Pro All-in-One 3520 a zbrusu nová Mageia 9

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Atom)
articles.description: Už za tři týdny proběhne další ročník akce OSFF Hackathon 2023. Hackathon se bude pořádat v Něměcku ve městě Bochum. Začíná 17. listopadu ve 14 hodin a potrvá celý víkend až do neděle.
articles.title: Coreboot hackathon 2023 už za tři týdny

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Linuxové jádra máme s dlouhou podporou LTS (Long-Term Support), ale v současnosti se diskutuje zkrácení této podpory ze 6 na 2 roky. LTS jsou v současnosti 4.14 (jen do ledna 2024), 4.19 (do prosince 2024), 5.4 (prosinec 2025), 5.10 (prosinec 2026), 5.15 (říjen 2026) a 6.1 (prosinec 2026).
articles.title: Jádra Super Long-Term Support s podporou 10 let

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: V úterý v USA podalo 41 státních zástupců hromadnou žalobu na společnost Meta pro klamavé a neférové praktiky Instagramu a Facebooku, které poškozují děti a způsobují závislost. Podle průzkumů stačí hodina denně na sociálních sítích a u dětí a dospívajících se objevuje strmý nárůst depresí i jiných psychických problémů.
articles.title: Hromadná žaloba v USA na Meta kvůli závislosti dětí na Instagramu a Facebooku

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Výzkumníci z universit v Atlantě, Michiganu a Bochumi objevili zranitelnost postranním kanálem v procesorech Apple ARM (iPhone, iPad, nové Macy). Zranitelnost je podobná Spectre na x86 a je demonstrována vzdáleným získáním privátních dat přes prohlížeč Safari.
articles.title: iLeakage: zranitelnost postranním kanálem na Apple ARM a Safari

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Knihovnu zlib používá ke kompresi dat velké množství  programů a najdeme ji snad v každém systému. Zlib používá algoritmus DEFLATE, stejně jako gzip nebo zip. Knihovna zlib-ng  (next-generation) je moderní, rychlou a kompatibilní náhradou se stejným API. Oproti zlib používá rychlejší algoritmus DEFLATE od Intelu a Cloudflare, dále pak SIMD instrukce procesorů x86, ARM, IBM Z a POWER9. Ve výsledku je komprese asi 5× rychlejší a dekomprese asi 2,5×.
articles.title: Fedora 40 možná přejde od zlib na zlib-ng

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jak X.Org Server, tak XWayland mají nové dílčí aktualizace, které řeší opravy tří nalezených zranitelností. Jde o další balíček chyb, které se v X.Org objevily po dvou chybách v X11 sahajících až do roku 1988.
articles.title: Nové verze XWayland a X.Org Server řeší tři bezpečnostní chyby

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nejnovější verze balíku Vulkan ovladače od AMD, tedy AMDVLK ve verzi 2023.Q4.1, už neobsahuje podporu pro staré Radeony generací Polaris a Vega. Modely jako Radeon RX 480 (rok 2016) či Vega 56 a Vega 64 (rok 2017) tak už nemohou s touto verzí využívat API Vulkan. Uživatelé tak buď musejí setrvat na starší verzi AMDVLK 2023.Q3, nebo sáhnout po Mesa RADV.
articles.title: AMDVLK 2023.Q4.1 už bez podpory Radeonů generací Vega a Polaris

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Oliver Fourdan z Red Hatu se blíže na svém blogu rozepsal o pokroku v tzv. Rootful módu XWaylandu. Ten od vydání letošní verze XWayland 23.1 přináší zlepšení v podpoře nastavení geometrie / rozlišení vnořeného X11 serveru, volitelnou integraci knihovny libdecor pro poskytování titulků oken či jejich dekorací. XWayland 23.2+ zase přináší dynamicky měnitelnou velikost těchto rootful oken.
articles.title: XWayland s Rootful Mode přináší lepší podporu běhu X11

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Štrobl)
articles.description: Pokud vyvíjíte svůj vlastní software a váš kód není jen oku lahodící, stavte se na dalším meetupu Cloud Native Prague. Dalším tématem je Continuous Integration, kde si povíme, jak automaticky sestavovat balíky vašich aplikací a probereme některé z technologií, které se v dnešní době používají. Nikdo přece jen nechce zbytečně čekat, než bude mít k dispozici balík pro nasazení na produkci. Samozřejmě otestovaný, že?
articles.title: Cloud Native Prague #6: jak na Continuous Integration

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Terraform vám umožní spravovat infrastrukturu jako kód, to znamená verzovanou v Gitu, přidávání zdrojů pomocí merge (pull) requestů a mnoho dalších výhod. Ukážeme si, jak Terraform pracuje, jak jej používat v týmu a jak jím spravovat infrastrukturu.
articles.title: Terraform: spravujte infrastrukturu jako kód (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Raptor Lake Refresh, neboli 14 generaci Intel Core, máme úspěšně na světě, ač za moc nestojí. Po ní přijde 15. generace Arrow Lake (notebooky ještě stihnou mezigeneraci Meteor Lake, ta ale pro desktopy nebude uvedena) a právě pro ni Intel začíná připravovat podporu všech potřebných částí, včetně podpory hardwarové akcelerace videa.
articles.title: Intel připravuje akceleraci videa pro desktopový Arrow Lake (15. generace Core)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vlastně už jsme si skoro zvykli, takže nejnovější informace od Canonicalu není šokem: firma i nadále hodlá držet tradici posledních LTS vydání Ubuntu Linuxu, kdy právě LTS vydání mají a nadále budou mít podporu 10 let.
articles.title: Canonical bude nadále držet podporu LTS vydání 10 let

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Kromě čištění starého kódu pro ethernetová zařízení se v Linuxu chystá i další čistka, a to v oblasti podpory zastaralých a již nepoužívaných Wi-Fi řešení. Na světě jsou jisté počáteční ideje, které ze starých Wi-Fi ovladačů vyhodit, věcí se mimo jiné zabývá vývojář Arnd Bergmann ze společnosti Linaro.
articles.title: Aktualizace plánu na odstranění ovladačů starých Wi-Fi z Linuxu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jednou z novinek Firefoxu 119 je zahrnutí většího množství obsahu do přehledové stránky Přehled Firefoxu – lze zde nalézt všechny otevřené panely ze všech oken a pokud uživatel synchronizuje svůj účet přes více zařízení, uvidí zde i panely z ostatních zařízení. Historie prohlížení je v přehledu zobrazena jako seznam a lze ji třídit dle data či domovské stránky.
articles.title: Firefox 119: úpravy PDF či lepší přehledová stránka

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: bkralik)
articles.description: Za poslední měsíc se událo spoustu nového. Se strahovskými bastlíři jste se mohli potkat na LinuxDays, kde jste si mohli zapájet demoboard s novým procesorem CH32V003 – RISC-V za deset centů, pro který mimochodem Vojta Suk napsal programátor běžící na Flipper Zero. Vyšlo Raspberry Pi 5 se spoustou inovací (i nových bugů), nový iPhone s Thread rádiem a USB-C místo Lightningu (který začali bastlíři hned hackovat) a v KiCADu už jde dělat databázové knihovny přes Inventree.
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 31: už jste si pohráli s RISC-V za 10 centů?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Miro)
articles.description: Bezplatný webinář se uskuteční ve čtvrtek 26. října od deseti hodin. Tématem bude efektivní komunikace s blížící se novou verzí Zabbixu 7.0 prostřednictvím jeho API. Alois Zadražil představí způsoby, jak využít Zabbix API k automatizaci běžných úkolů a provede vás různými možnostmi integrace, které Zabbix API nabízí.
articles.title: Online webinář zdarma: komunikace se Zabbixem 7.0 pomocí API

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Raspberry Pi Foundation oznámila očekávané vydání jednodeskového počítače Raspberry Pi 5, který nabízí rozhraní PCIe a je více než dvakrát výkonnější než jeho předchůdce. Do konce příštího týdne budou odeslány všechny prioritní zásilky a všichni oficiální prodejci obdrží počáteční zásoby 4GB i 8GB varianty.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi 5 je venku, prodejci jej naskladní během dvou týdnů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Pátá verze jednodeskového počítače Raspberry Pi byla oznámena na konci září. Přináší několik vylepšení, včetně PCIe 2.0 a několikanásobně výkonnějšího GPU. Alasdair Allan z Raspberry Pi Foundation se zaměřil na měření výkonu procesoru v benchmarku Geekbench.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi 5 je více než dvakrát rychlejší než předchozí verze

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Chceš začít s programováním? Python je oblíbený programovací jazyk mezi vývojáři i zaměstnavateli a zároveň super vstupenka do světa programování. Nauč se přemýšlet jako programátor a efektivně využívat Python na řešení nejrůznějších problémů. Online Python Akademie znamená celkem 12 týdnů, vždy jedna lekce týdně, večer od 18:00 do 21:00. Následující kurz začíná 9. listopadu.
articles.title: Online Python Akademie: začněte s programováním v oblíbeném jazyce (online kurz)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Google byla přistižena při zobrazování škodlivé reklamy, která je tak přesvědčivá, že se jí pravděpodobně podařilo oklamat některé uživatele. Jde o reklamu na otevřeného správce hesel Keepass, u které není možné poznat, že jde o podvrh. Google ovšem na svém webu tvrdí, že zobrazované reklamy prověřuje.
articles.title: Falešná doména správce hesel Keepass zneužívá záměny znaků v IDN

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři počítali s tím, že Debian 12 Bookworm bude mít sloučený obsah adresáře /usr, jako to už delší dobu mají ostatní distribuce. Technický výbor Debianu se na začátku letošního roku rozhodl zavést moratorium na přesouvání sloučených souborů.
articles.title: Debian počítá se sloučením /usr v příštím vydání, zrušil dočasné moratorium

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V listopadu se účet Firefoxu přejmenuje na účet Mozilly. Jedná se o změnu názvu, která odráží postupnou změnu použití tohoto uživatelského účtu. Původně šlo o účet, který byl spojen pouze se synchronizací dat prohlížeče Firefox. Postupně se jeho použití rozšířilo na další služby, jako je třeba Mozilla VPN či Pocket. Původní značka Firefox již přesně neodráží široký rozsah nabídky Mozilly, uvádí dokument se zdůvodněním.
articles.title: Účet Firefoxu se v listopadu přejmenuje na účet Mozilly

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Jaromír Novák na blogu organizace CZ.NIC upozorňuje na zprávu Evropské komise nazvanou Broadbandové pokrytí 2022. Ta obsahuje srovnání rozvoje vysokorychlostních sítí elektronických komunikací mezi lety 2021 a 2022 v 31 evropských zemích. Zpráva zahrnuje porovnání rozvoje 11 technologií umožňujících vysokorychlostního přístupu k internetu – DSL, VDSL, VDSL2 vectoring, kabelový modem DOCSIS 3.0, kabelový modem DOCSIS 3.1, FTTP, FWA, LTE, 5G, 5G v pásmu 3,4–3,8 GHz a satelitní připojení.
articles.title: Evropská komise vydala zprávu Broadbandové pokrytí 2022

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Qualcomm potvrdil, že ve spolupráci se společností Google vyvíjí čip „RISC-V Snapdragon Wear“ a plánuje komerčně rozšířit řešení pro nositelná zařízení postavená na RISC-V. Tyto základy pomohou připravit půdu pro další produkty v rámci ekosystému Android, které budou moci využívat výhody vlastních procesorů s nízkou spotřebou a vysokým výkonem, vysvětluje Qualcomm.
articles.title: Společnost Qualcomm oznámila první SoC pro Android s hlavním jádrem na RISC-V

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Velmi vážná zranitelnost s označením CVE-2023–20198 dostala maximální stupeň závažnosti 10. Nachází se ve webovém uživatelském rozhraní softwaru Cisco IOS XE. Zranitelný je každý síťový přepínač, směrovač nebo řadič bezdrátové sítě LAN se systémem IOS XE, který má povolenou funkci serveru HTTP nebo HTTPS a je vystaven internetu.
articles.title: Nezáplatovaná chyba ohrožuje Cisco IOS XE, napadeny jsou tisíce prvků

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Vědci zkoumali, jak to vlastně je s padáním mince. Vysokoškoláci z let krize mají dnes lepší platy. První černé díry mohly vznikat bez hvězd. Galaxie v Andromedě zažila ve srovnání s Mléčnou dráhou dramata.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Elektrony v grafenových kvantových tečkách obíhají extrémně rychle

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Jako každý říjen vyšlo nové Ubuntu s deriváty a tentokrát také s komplikacemi. Začátek podzimu krom toho přinesl další povýšení na Debian 12 v odvozených distribucích Linux Mint Debian Edition, SpiralLinux či Raspberry Pi OS, nové obrazy přímo Debianu a aktualizace IPFire, Porteus, Tails, elementary OS, Slax, OpenWrt či Window Maker Live.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 39-41/2023

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Geopolitika mění trh s čipy, podíl Tchaj-wanu podle IDC klesne. Infor uvádí nové verze svých odvětvově specifických řešení CloudSuite. Amazon rozvíjí služby umělé inteligence: rozhraní Bedrock je nyní všeobecně dostupné, firma nabízí i další novinky. Absencí energetického managementu přicházejí tuzemské firmy ročně o stovky tisíc korun. Zmrazená část kvantového počítače může komunikovat bezdrátově. Řešení pro generativní umělou inteligenci od Dell Technologies urychlují podnikovou transformaci.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Geopolitika mění trh s čipy, podíl Tchaj-wanu podle IDC klesne

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 42/2023

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Třikrát supravodivost: grafenové kvazikrystaly, strojové učení a Majoranovy kvazičástice. Led XIX: nově objevená fáze. Je elektron spíš koule, nebo vajíčko? Na Venuši možná blesk neudeří. Evropa bude mít svůj první superpočítač s výkonem v řádu trilionů operací za sekundu.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Umělá inteligence poprvé kompletně detekovala a klasifikovala supernovu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Pure se zákazníkům zavazuje platit za energii a prostor úložiště. Poznejte vývoj low-code a no-code. Taktik překvapil. V Česku je nejméně ICT specialistek z celé EU. Přístup low-code používá skoro polovina firem. Náklady na cloud se snadno mohou vymknout kontrole.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Přístup low-code používá skoro polovina firem

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Uvažujete o upgradu vašeho operačního systému? Přestaňte hledat, právě teď jste schopni získat skvělé slevy na Windows a Office. Skutečně můžete dostat vysoké slevy na pravé Windows 10 a Microsoft Office s doživotní licencí, když nenakoupíte přímo u Microsoftu, ale místo toho zamíříte na Goodoffer24. Vážně, jen si zkontrolujte neskutečné ceny, pokud upgradujete váš ekosystém s Windows.
articles.title: Prodeje Goodoffer24 na Halloween: skvělé ceny včetně Windows 10/11 jen za € 12!

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 41/2023

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Antihmota v gravitaci Země padá jako normální běžná hmota. Umelou inteligenci regulací nezastavíme, Evropě hrozí technologické zaostávání. Obří černé díry ovlivňují chemické složení svých galaxií. Původ Saturnových prstenců srážkou ledových měsíců planety.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Brunova konstanta a řada převrácených hodnot prvočíselných dvojic

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Slavní „pěstitelé“ jablíček si své nové produkty před uvedením na trh rádi schovávají a své žhavé přírůstky představují mnohdy až na poslední chvíli. Fanouškům tak často nezbývá nic jiného, než se uchýlit k ještě žhavějším spekulacím a doufat, že se firma bude držet svých železně pravidelných dat vydání. Bude Apple sklízet úspěch i v roce 2023?
articles.title: Heureka: Co chystá Apple v následujících měsících

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled zářijových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za září 2023

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Ubuntu 24.04 bude Noble Numbat (vznešený mravencojed žíhaný).
articles.title: Ubuntu 24.04 bude Noble Numbat

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána beta verze AlmaLinuxu 9.3 s kódovým názvem Shamrock Pampas Cat. Podrobnosti v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: AlmaLinux 9.3 Beta

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Clement "Clem" Lefebvre publikoval souhrn dění v Linux Mintu za říjen 2023. Dočíst se lze například, že Cinnamon 6.0 přijde s experimentální podporou Waylandu. V září přispělo na vývoj Linux Mintu 335 dárců celkovou částkou 8 922 dolarů. Dalších 869 patronů přispívá na Patreonu celkovou částkou 3 006 dolarů.
articles.title: Cinnamon 6.0 přijde s experimentální podporou Waylandu

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová stabilní verze 6.4 (aktuálně 6.4.3160.34) webového prohlížeče Vivaldi (Wikipedie). Postavena je na Chromiu 118. Přehled novinek i s náhledy v příspěvku na blogu. Přehrávání videa v režimu obraz v obraze (Pop-out Video) má nově nastavování hlasitosti. Vylepšena byla také synchronizace, poštovní klient i kalendář.
articles.title: Vivaldi 6.4

articles.author: Fluttershy, yay!
articles.description: Modální textový editor Helix, napsaný v Rustu, byl vydán ve verzi 23.10. Jde o velké vydání po půl roce. Přidává podporu více různých language serverů současně, fuzzy matching přes Nucleo, registry inspirované editorem Kakoune a mnoho dalšího. Více v seznamu změn.
articles.title: Helix 23.10

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Microsoft přispěje projektu OpenStreetMap částkou 150 tisíc dolarů.
articles.title: Microsoft přispěje projektu OpenStreetMap částkou 150 tisíc dolarů

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byly publikovány informace o bezpečnostním problému iLeakage (pdf) zařízení od společnosti Apple. Po více než roce od nahlášení Applu. S vlastní doménou a logem. Útočník může využít spekulativního provádění instrukcí a například z jednoho panelu webového prohlížeče Safari získat jméno a heslo použito v druhém panelu, viz YouTube.
articles.title: iLeakage, bezpečnostní problém zařízení od společnosti Apple

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byl vydán TrueNAS SCALE 23.10 “Cobia”. Přehled novinek této open source storage platformy postavené na Debianu v poznámkách k vydání.
articles.title: TrueNAS SCALE 23.10 „Cobia“

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: X.Org X server 21.1.9 a Xwayland 23.2.2 řeší 3 bezpečnostní chyby: CVE-2023-5367, CVE-2023-5380 a CVE-2023-5574.
articles.title: X.Org X server 21.1.9 a Xwayland 23.2.2 řeší 3 bezpečnostní chyby

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byl vydán Mozilla Firefox 119.0. Přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání, poznámkách k vydání pro firmy a na stránce věnované vývojářům. Vypíchnout lze vylepšený Přehled Firefoxu (Firefox View). Řešeny jsou rovněž bezpečnostní chyby. Nový Firefox 119 je již k dispozici také na Flathubu a Snapcraftu.
articles.title: Firefox 119.0

articles.description: The Ubuntu 24.04 codename has been revealed as "Noble Numbat" while kicking off this next development cycle that is all the more exciting due to being the next long-term support (LTS) release...
articles.title: Ubuntu 24.04 "Noble Numbat" Opens For Development

articles.description: Earlier this month Framework 13 began shipping out their AMD Ryzen powered modular laptop. Unfortunately though the launch-day testing of the Framework laptop under Linux was hampered by a BIOS issue. It's taken longer, but this week a new BIOS is now available for testing that resolves the AMD Linux graphics issue. Here's how to go about easily flashing the system BIOS with Fwupd and LVFS to get up and running well on Linux...
articles.title: AMD-Powered Framework Laptop Now Working On Linux With Latest BIOS

articles.description: With the newly-started Mesa 24.0 development cycle a very exciting feature landed today... The ACO compiler integration for the RadeonSI Gallium3D driver has appeared to effectively wrap up for optionally making use of this Valve-developed shader compiler as an alternative to the AMDGPU LLVM shader back-end...
articles.title: RadeonSI Completes ACO Compiler Support With Mesa 24.0

articles.description: Tucked away within the October 2023 monthly status updates for the Linux Mint project is word they have begun working on their Wayland support...
articles.title: Linux Mint Starts Working On Wayland For Cinnamon, Likely Not Fully Ready Until 2026

articles.description: Given the recent launch of the Intel Arc Graphics A580 for under $200, I've been working on a fresh round of Intel / AMD Radeon / NVIDIA GeForce Linux gaming/graphics and compute benchmark results. Next week that fresh arsenal of Linux graphics benchmarks on the very latest drivers will be published but for today is a look at the most surprising aspect: the OpenCL-focused GPU compute benchmarks.
articles.title: Intel's Open-Source Compute Runtime Performing Increasingly Well Against NVIDIA's Proprietary Linux Driver

articles.description: The Servo open-source web browser engine continues progressing as a community project under the leadership of Linux Foundation Europe. Over the course of October more features were implemented and additional fixes merged...
articles.title: Servo Web Engine Made Some Nice Progress In October

articles.description: Ubuntu desktop developer Daniel Van Vugt has been working on enabling zero-copy support for discrete GPUs within GNOME's Mutter compositor to deliver faster performance. This appears to be working so far with the Nouveau open-source NVIDIA driver...
articles.title: Experimental Zero-Copy Support For Nouveau With GNOME Mutter

articles.description: Adding to the long list of improvements to find with next year's KDE Plasma 6.0 release is better file/folder searching with the "Recent Files" search area...
articles.title: File Searching On KDE Plasma 6.0 To Use Less CPU Resources & Better Usability

articles.description: Blender 4.0 will be releasing in early November but already there is something to look forward to with Blender 4.1 next year...
articles.title: Blender 4.1 To Support Cycles Renderer On AMD RDNA3 APUs

articles.description: Shortly after today's Mesa 23.3 branching and opening Mesa 24.0-devel on Git main, Mesa 23.3-rc1 is now formally available as the first weekly release candidate for this quarter's feature series...
articles.title: Mesa 23.3-rc1 Available For Testing With NVIDIA Vulkan Driver, Raspberry Pi 5 Support

articles.description: For those wishing to interact with Steam from virtual reality (VR) headsets, today Valve promoted SteamVR 2.0 to stable...
articles.title: SteamVR 2.0 Officially Released With Many Improvements

articles.description: Mesa 23.3 has now been branched in Git and in turn that opens up the mainline code to beginning feature work on what will become Mesa 24.0 when it releases in Q1'2024...
articles.title: Mesa 24.0 Enters Feature Development For Open-Source OpenGL & Vulkan Drivers

articles.description: Fedora 39 failed to make its "early" release target date, it didn't meet its otherwise targeted release date one week later, and is now facing another possible setback still. These release delays have been due to outstanding blocker bugs all related to the Raspberry Pi...
articles.title: The Fedora 39 Release Has Been Held Up By Raspberry Pi Bugs

articles.description: With the new AMD Ryzen 7 PRO 7840U Zen 4 mobile processor powering the likes of the Lenovo ThinkPad P14s Gen 4, I was curious about the performance impact of employing full disk encryption. Here are some benchmarks looking at the performance cost to enabling full disk encryption versus not utilizing any disk encryption while running Fedora Workstation on the new ThinkPad P14s Gen 4 AMD laptop.
articles.title: Benchmarking The Performance Cost To Full Disk Encryption For Modern AMD Ryzen Laptops

articles.description: Building off the recent release of OSPRay 3.0 with initial GPU acceleration support, OSPRay Studio has now been updated against this new version. As a reminder, OSPRay Studio is Intel's open-source interactive visualization and ray-tracing application...
articles.title: Intel Releases OSPRay Studio 0.13 With Xe GPU Acceleration Support

articles.description: Fedora Linux is looking at possibly transitioning from Zlib to Zlib-NG for this widely-used compression library. This tentative change request is filed in part by Intel software engineers looking to enhance the Zlib performance on modern processors...
articles.title: Fedora To Possibly Transition From Zlib To Zlib-NG For Better Performance

articles.description: There were many interesting talks last week at XDC 2023 in Spain around Rusticl, the open-source NVIDIA Vulkan driver, the Raspberry Pi graphics driver, RADV ray-tracing, AMD color management and HDR with the Steam Deck / Gamescope, and others. One of the other talks many Phoronix readers are likely to be interested in is around the state of the Wine Wayland driver...
articles.title: The Ongoing Work For Native Wine Wayland Support

articles.description: AMDVLK 2023.Q4.1 was published today as AMD's first Radeon Vulkan open-source driver update since last month. There comes some new features and improvements with this version but they have also decided to drop Polaris (GFX8) and Vega (GFX9) graphics support...
articles.title: AMDVLK 2023.Q4.1: Polaris & Vega Support Dropped, Counter-Strike 2 Tuning

articles.description: Red Hat engineers continue working on Stratis Storage as a modern Linux storage solution that leverages the Rust programming language and built atop the proven XFS file-system and LVM. Stratis continues to strive for ZFS and Btrfs like functionality although its use in the wild still seems rather limited...
articles.title: Stratis 3.6 Released For Improving Linux Storage Management

articles.description: The X.Org Server and XWayland saw new point releases today as a result of three more security vulnerabilities being disclosed...
articles.title: XWayland & X.Org Server See New Releases Due To Three More Security Vulnerabilities

articles.description: Most Linux desktop users/gamers/enthusiasts are relying on XWayland for X11 client compatibility atop Wayland compositors in the "rootless" mode. With the XWayland rootless mode, X11 applications and games can integrate nicely within a Wayland desktop environment with just the individual client window presented. However, for those interested, the XWayland "rootful" mode has become more capable this year for those wanting to render an entire X11 environment within the Wayland compositor as a window...
articles.title: XWayland's Rootful Mode Is Becoming More Useful

articles.description: Since AMD's acquisition of Xilinx and working to broaden the portfolio of offerings for the data center, more AMD-Xilinx drivers have been working their way toward the mainline Linux kernel. There's been upstreaming efforts such as the Versal EDAC driver, generating DeviceTree nodes for PCI devices, Versal watchdog driver, QDMA driver, CDX bus support, and more. The latest driver working its way toward the mainline kernel from AMD is the AXI 1-wire driver...
articles.title: AXI 1-Wire Driver Is AMD's Latest Upstreaming Effort To The Linux Kernel

articles.description: The VKMS driver as a virtual kernel mode-setting solution as a software-only implementation of KMS for use with primarily headless Linux systems continues tacking on more features. Maíra Canal and Melissa Wen presented last week at XDC 2023 on the VKMS driver that continues proving very useful for headless platforms as well as for testing purposes...
articles.title: The VKMS Display Driver Continues Evolving Nicely For Headless Linux Systems

articles.description: As yet another open-source Radeon Linux graphics driver change ahead of the upcoming Mesa 23.3 code branching and feature freeze is Vulkan VK_KHR_cooperative_matrix support with the RADV driver for RDNA3 hardware and newer using the GPU's Wavefront Mixed-precision Multiply Accumulate (WMMA) functionality...
articles.title: RADV Vulkan Driver Merges Cooperative Matrix Support Using RDNA3 WMMA

articles.description: As we approach the end of 2023, sadly, the real-time kernel "PREEMPT_RT" support still hasn't been mainlined... The main blocker pending is still the ongoing work around non-blocking consoles / threaded console handling to then allow the few dozen remaining out-of-tree RT kernel patches to be merged. The good news is that when the PREEMPT_RT support is ready for mainline, it looks like the RISC-V architecture support will also be real-time friendly too...
articles.title: Linux RISC-V Preparing For Real-Time Kernel Support (PREEMPT_RT)

articles.description: AMD's RadeonSI Gallium3D driver has been around for a decade since the Radeon HD 7000 "Southern Islands" graphics card days while finally the OpenGL renderer string is being changed to reflect "RadeonSI" as the name of the driver in use...
articles.title: AMD Making It More Clear When Their RadeonSI OpenGL Driver Is Being Used

articles.description: Given recent talk of upstream Linux Long-Term Support (LTS) kernels likely being reduced from six to two year support windows moving forward, Canonical today decided to re-affirm their support for ten years of support with Ubuntu Long Term Support versions...
articles.title: Canonical To Stick With 10 Year Support Cycle For Ubuntu LTS Releases

articles.description: Samuel Pitoiset of Valve's open-source Linux graphics driver team has landed initial support for GFX11.5 "RDNA3 refresh" graphics within the RADV Vulkan driver for the upcoming Mesa 23.3...
articles.title: RADV Vulkan Driver Lands Initial Support For GFX11.5 "RDNA3 Refresh"

articles.description: While Meteor Lake isn't shipping until December, Intel's open-source Linux engineers for months have already been working on 15th Gen Arrow Lake (as well as Lunar Lake, among their other processor lines) for getting the driver support in order. The latest early hardware enablement to talk about is the initial Arrow Lake S support coming to their video acceleration drivers...
articles.title: Intel Video Acceleration Drivers Begin Preparing For Arrow Lake S

articles.description: In addition to old and unmaintained Ethernet driver code set for removal, there is an effort underway to clear out some obsolete and orphaned WiFi drivers from the Linux kernel...
articles.title: Linux's Latest Plan For Removing Old WiFi Drivers

articles.description: Canonical continues investing in Mir as their Wayland compositor and set of platform abstraction interfaces to make it easier for IoT and other "smart" devices to run atop Ubuntu Core. Most recently the Mir developers have been working to partially re-architect their graphics platform handling to better handle multiple GPU/display devices...
articles.title: Ubuntu's Mir Working On Hybrid Graphics / Multi-GPU Support

articles.description: Ahead of the official planned announcement for Tuesday, the Mozilla Firefox 119.0 release binaries have been published for this monthly feature update...
articles.title: Firefox 119 Available With Improved Firefox View, Expanded PDF Editing
Daylight Saving Choice
Extinction Mechanisms

articles.author: Jeff Scott
articles.description:
The Walking Dead franchise has ventured into a lot of different video game genres. But it has yet to infect the match 3 genre, until today.


Unlike The Walking Dead: Destinies, The Walking Dead Match 3 Tales is a puzzle RPG set within the universe of Robert Kirkman's original comic. Through match 3 puzzles, players will combat Walkers and various other enemies while playing as various characters from the series, with each having their own set of unique skills and weapons to aid you.




Both heroes and villains are selectable in the mobile title. Characters of note include Rick, Michonne, Carl, Glenn, The Governor, Maggie, Abraham, and more. There's weapon crafting outside of match 3 rounds that can give you an edge. As well as a mode to build your own settlement which leads to unlocking …
articles.title: The Walking Dead has a match 3 game now, based on the original comic

articles.author: Christine Choi
articles.description:
Suika Game is a game about fruit. It’s also one of the most addictive, yet infuriating things I’ve ever experienced.


Suika Game (aka “Watermelon Game”) on the Nintendo Switch is a charming, simple affair. You start with a box into which you are instructed to drop various fruits. When two fruits of the same type touch, they merge together into a bigger fruit, generating points. The goal is to merge as many fruits as you can to eventually create the largest fruit: a watermelon.


It feels like Suika Game should be a fun and relaxing experience. The screen is filled with colorful fruit with little faces on them. The music is bouncy, and there are satisfying little popping noises when fruits merge together. The gameplay is simple. So why do I feel like throwing my Switch against a wall? 


P…
articles.title: Suika Game has me raging about watermelons

articles.author: Chris Carter
articles.description:
Occasionally, I'll try a "weird controller" challenge: I mean, playing things with a DDR mat is just a fun idea. But have you ever considered beating Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom bosses with an ocarina? 


Reddit user gvmimi just did it. And for multiple fights, too!

I beat the Wind Temple Boss with my Ocarina as a controller
byu/gvmimi intearsofthekingdom


Here they are fighting the Wind Temple boss. And the Water Temple boss. And astonishingly, the Lightning Temple boss. Their goal is to beat the whole game with said Ocarina controller, which subs for a traditional control method for the Switch.


How are they doing it? As gvmimi notes: "I have a program on my computer that allows me to map different musical notes/frequencies to different inputs." They also pointed out that they've cleared Breath of the Wild with an Ocarina, so their determination is now tenfold.


Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom will be talked about for years


When I first experienced Tears of the Kingdom in complete isolation during the review period, I knew it was going to be big when it came to showing off emergent gameplay online (bold claim, I know!). There are just so many divergent puzzle solutions that it's a blast to see how someone else handled a problem. In fact, I specifically sought out other people who also cleared a lot of puzzles by throwing a bunch of stuff in a pile until it built a giant contraption. It was straight out of that scene in Home Alone 2 where Marv builds a little structure to help him and Harry get out of the basement of Uncle Rob and Aunt Georgette's townhouse.


Where was I? Oh, Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is a fun game to both play and watch: which is becoming a rarity as many other AAA games rely on old open world tropes.

The post A brave soul is beating Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom bosses with an Ocarina controller appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: A brave soul is beating Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom bosses with an Ocarina controller

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
Hyperstrange and Mekworx have announced that the second episode of the Early Access FPS Supplice has been released into the wild.


If you’re not familiar with it, Supplice is a new FPS built-in GZDoom. Kind of like Selaco but not quite as flashy and also available now. It’s being constructed by prominent Doom modders. I have the early access, but I’ve not made it much further than the second mission. That’s not a condemnation. I just got distracted and haven’t gone back. I guess you could interpret that as a condemnation of my attention span.


The new episode boasts five new missions, some new monsters to drill into, and “new environmental interactions. Whenever someone uses that word, I immediately think of flushing the toilet in Duke Nukem 3D. When Mekworx uses it, they mean sucking monsters out of airlocks. Those are two similar concepts, but one is much deadlier.


Supplice follows Zorah Null as she shows up for her first day on a terraforming job to instead find monsters. It’s worth noting that, unlike Doom, Supplice has more of a narrative, complete with voice acting. Like many retro-inspired shooters, the idea is to blend old and modern design. The fact that it uses an old engine just makes it more convincing.


Supplice is available in Early Access for PC already. The new episode is available now.

The post Supplice supplements itself with second episode appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Supplice supplements itself with second episode

articles.title: Just Dance 2024 and Dave the Diver follow up Mario Wonder on the Switch eShop this week

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Respawn has revealed the next season of the battle-royale FPS, titled Apex Legends: Ignite. The highlight of the new season is the electrifying new Legend: Conduit. 


For the first time ever, Cross Progression has also been added to Apex. Following the seasons electrical theme, the Storm Point map has also been energized and overhauled.




Electrifying new Legend: Conduit


A new support Legend, Conduit, makes her way to Apex Legends in Season 19. Her passive ability "Savior's Speed" gives her a burst of speed specifically when running towards allies outside of her Tactical range. This syncs up with her Tactical "Radiant Transfer" This ability causes Conduit to send out a surge of energy to a teammate, generating temporary shields to the ally and herself. Her ultimate "Energy Barricade" allows her to deploy an array of shield-jamming devices that damage and slow enemies in its range. With this arsenal, Conduit has a versatile kit allowing her to cut off enemy rotations.


Image via Respawn Entertainment


Energized Storm Point & Cross Progression


Revamps to the Storm Point map have reduced its size while amping up the intensity, leading to players getting into more fights quicker. Players can also explore Wattston's Town Takeover - Pylon and engage in fights at ZEUS Station. Following with the theme of Apex Legends: Ignite, the map is electrified.


With the implementation of Cross Progression, players can now brag about their collected cosmetics, badges, and achievements across all platforms and accounts. This means you can unlock a cosmetic on PC, then jump on your Xbox and still have that cosmetic.


I've been out of the Apex Legends loop for a while now but this seems like a great time to jump in. Cross Progression is huge and caters to casual players like me who might want to jump in here and there on different platforms.


Apex Legends: Ignite goes live on all platforms on October 31.

The post Apex Legends Season 19 brings new Legend, Cross Progression, and more appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Apex Legends Season 19 brings new Legend, Cross Progression, and more

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
Alan Wake is the cornerstone upon which Remedy Entertainment's magnum opus rests. This magnum opus is, however, not any specific game, but their interrelationship, resulting in the creation of the Remedy Connected Universe.  


And, though Control established RCU in concrete terms, understanding how it all began is crucial.


Naturally, it all began with Alan Wake proper. As Remedy's Sam Lake will attest, neither Quantum Break nor Max Payne are a part of the official RCU, and they will therefore be left aside for the purposes of recapping and explaining the full story of Alan Wake. We will, however, need to take a look at Control and American Nightmare to make sense of what's been going on, and how it all sets the stage for Alan Wake 2.


Oh, before we begin, it might be good to set the st…
articles.title: What you need to know about Alan Wake’s story, before jumping into the sequel

articles.description:
Alan Wake 2 launches this week, and developer Remedy Entertainment has detailed post-launch content including the two expansions and New Game Plus mode.


The first expansion, Night Springs, is reportedly arriving sometime in spring 2024. Taking place in the eponymous fictional TV show, Night Springs has you play as "several familiar characters from the world of Alan Wake." 


Here are the full details courtesy of Remedy:



Visions and dreams. Fiction is written and coming true. Fiction collapses and remains just words on a page. These are those stories… in Night Springs.   


Play as several familiar characters from the world of Alan Wake and experience the unexplainable in multiple self-contained episodes of Night Springs, a fictional tv-show set in the world of Alan Wake.  



The Lake…
articles.title: Alan Wake 2 gets details for its two expansions and New Game Plus

articles.author: James Herd
articles.description:
Risk of Rain Returns, a remake of the 2013 roguelike platformer has announced its release date, and it’s sooner than you might think. You can jump into the randomly generated action in just a couple weeks, on November 8.




In a post on Twitter, the official Risk of Rain account showcased a new character, the Pilot, designed to be a crowd-control prioritized combatant. Armed with a standard Clusterfire attack and a secondary attack called Target Acquired, players can make quick work of any enemies that cross their path. 


But, they also look to be rather agile, which lets them put space between themselves and enemies. The Pilot also has a utility ability called Rapid Deployment, which makes good use of their parachute. 


Risk of Rain Returns is introducing The Pilot, in addition to another new survivor, The Drifter. The Drifter looks to be more of an up-close-and-personal melee fighter, using their sleeping bag and other everyday items as instruments of blunt force trauma. 


In addition to Risk of Rain Returns’ release date, developer Hopoo Games also announced a celebration of the series’ community called The Festival of Gup, also set to occur live on Gearbox’s Twitch on November 8 at 10:30 a.m. PST / 12:30 p.m. CST / 1:30 p.m. EST. 


Risk of Rain Returns will be available for PC and Nintendo Switch on November 8.

The post Risk of Rain Returns returns on November 8 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Risk of Rain Returns returns on November 8

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
It was recently brought to people's attention that the Master Collection of Metal Gear Solid was near unplayable on Steam Deck. Fortunately, Valve has been quick off the mark, and a fix is rolling out.


According to a recent Twitter/X post from Pierre-Loup Grifais – coder for Valve – a hotifx has been deployed.  This should tend to the crashing issues people have been having with both Metal Gear Solid 2 and Metal Gear Solid 3.




As is often the case when it comes to the Steam Deck, the problem appeared to be related to compatibility issues with the device's operating system. This new patch – sent out literally moments ago – addresses issues with Proton, the Linux-based software the Deck is built around.


What was the problem?


In a recent report/video from GamingOnLinux, the recent release of the first three Metal Gear Solid entries were shown to be not suited for the Deck. While MGS runs fine, it seems to maintain its old-school 4:3 aspect ratio, and the game is locked at 30fps. This may not be an issue for some, but others may take exception to the sizeable black borders and lower framerate.


However, at least it was running on the device. The same could not be said for the second and third games, neither of which would play at all. Both Sons of Liberty and Snake Eater were crashing to the Steam Library, meaning they couldn't be played at all.


Given the popularity of the classic Metal Gear Solid games, it's not surprising Valve was pretty quick to act. Hopefully, MGS2 and MGS3 should run now, as the update's purpose is to "address a blocking crash in cutscenes." At the time of writing, a fix for the missing audio in cutscenes is still being worked on.

The post Metal Gear Solid collection is messy on Steam Deck, but Valve is rolling out fixes appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Metal Gear Solid collection is messy on Steam Deck, but Valve is rolling out fixes

articles.author: Saniah Bates
articles.description:
League of Legends publisher Riot Games debuted another in-universe music group called Heartsteel, and their debut single "Paranoia" dropped earlier this week on October 23. Alongside the single, several new skins are being added to the MOBA. 




Despite the boy band being completely new to the LoL world, several members of Heartsteel may sound familiar. A few of Heartsteel's members are voiced by popular artists in real life; Kyan is voiced by Cal Scruby, K’Sante is voiced by Tobi Lou, Sett is voiced by Øzi, and Ezreal is voiced by Byun Baekhyun.


Heartsteel-inspired skins make a debut 


Players of League of Legends will not only have a chance to enjoy Heartsteel’s music, but will also be able to mimic the looks of their favorite members with new skins for each member of Heartsteel in-game. Although each member will recieve their own skin, only Kayn and Yone will get different tiers of skins. Kayn is set to recieve a skin with a Legendary status while Yone is set to get a Prestige skin, in addition to their originals. 


Fans can catch a glimpse of the new skins in Heartsteel's 'Paranoia' music video. Alongside the music video, an official skins trailer from Riot Games has also been released. The 'Paranoia' skins will be available to players on November 8.




Riot Games has been debuting in-universe music groups for a while now. Some of their most popular groups were virtual K-pop group K/DA (2018) and hip hop group True Damage (2019). The in-universe music group approach that Riot Games has been taking is seeing a lot of success. K/DA blew many away with their debut single "POP/STARS" in 2018, which truly kicked off the League of Legends band legacy. 


Heartsteel is set to make a similarly large impact on the League of Legends universe through exciting music, entertaining visuals, and taking on the title of Riot’s first in-game boy band.

The post Heartsteel is the latest League pop crossover, with a new single and skins appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Heartsteel is the latest League pop crossover, with a new single and skins

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
If you've been waiting for the all-important Payday 3 patch to start rolling out, hopefully you won't have much longer to wait. While there's no release date for it just yet, the developer has at least tried to explain why it's taking so long.


In a post on the Payday website, Starbreeze Studios has issued yet another apology, acknowledging that it's been a bit quiet recently. However, the message "lifts the curtain" a little to give some insight into what the developer is working on.




It turns out the reasons behind the patch being delayed are "long and complicated." As it transpires, the team has discovered "critical errors" which has lead to a "significant risk to player progression being wiped" if the problems aren't addressed.


There's light at the end of the tunnel


Fear not, though, as the update "has been sent off and is currently going through a testing and certification process." Keep an ear out for further details as it sounds like the patch could be ready to launch soon. We just don't know when yet.


Upon release, Payday 3 was met with largely negative feedback. For starters, unreliable matchmaking was causing headaches for many players. On top of that, the game requires a constant internet connection, even when playing solo. That alone was a thorn in many people's sides.


While the patch has been delayed a couple of times already, many will be hopeful Starbreeze will be able to resolve the issues and get it sent out. The studio may also be considering an offline mode.

The post Reasons behind the Payday 3 update delay are “long and complicated” appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Reasons behind the Payday 3 update delay are “long and complicated”

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
It's almost Halloween, so you'll probably be wanting some horror games to see you through the end of October. How about some Capcom games, then? As of right now, the studio is temporarily discounting quite a healthy selection of its releases.


We all know that Capcom has a myriad of choices, especially when it comes to horror, so it'll be quite unfortunate if you can't find at least one franchise that'll suit you.




For example: Resident Evil 4 Remake is currently 30% off (and comes as a special double pack featuring the Separate Ways DLC). Want more Resident Evil? How about Village for 60% off? Even the weaker entries (you know the ones) are discounted.


You can also get all the mainline Dead Rising games in a special Halloween Pack. Or maybe you have all the games mentioned above but want some DLC. Those are in the sale as well.


This devil...he may cry...


Of course, if horror is not your thing, there are other things in the Capcom sale. The Monster Hunter and Street Fighter series are included in the discounts as well. As is Marvel vs. Capcom. 


Hell, even Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective is 34% off. You can check out everything that's currently on sale either by going to the developer's website or just heading straight to Steam. It looks like the event will be going on until November 7, so you've got a bit of time to decide.

The post A bunch of Capcom games are on sale in time for Halloween appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: A bunch of Capcom games are on sale in time for Halloween

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
For those who find Destiny 2's Shader preview system needlessly obtuse and confusing,, there is good news on the horizon. Bungie is, according to the latest information, bound to rework how Shaders work with 2024's The Final Shape DLC.


It's an unexpected reveal that's come from a fairly unassuming source: a recent livestream posted by Destiny 2 streamer Datto. Players have been asking for a better way to preview, filter, and group shaders for the longest time now, with threads explaining these cosmetics popping up every so often. 


The crux of the issue, really, comes from the fact that even though the Shaders' icons only show four colours and textures at a time, they actually hold way more of them, which can lead to situations where one picks a mostly grey shader, only for it to apply …
articles.title: Destiny 2’s Shaders are being reworked, at long last

articles.author: Smangaliso Simelane
articles.description:
Alan Wake 2 is a paradox. It's inspired by television shows like Twin Peaks, books like Paul Auster’s Book of Illusions, and games like Resident Evil 2 Remake. Yet it feels like nothing else out there. 


With its FMV scenes, mind-bending plot, and references to Control, the game is easily identified as a Remedy one, but it manages to do things even the most avid Remedy fans won’t anticipate.


I happen to be one of those avid Remedy fans and after spending several hours with the game, I feel like Alan Wake 2 may be one of the most interesting and experimental games in recent years, both in terms of its metafictional plot and unorthodox gameplay.


Screenshot by Destructoid.


Alan Wake 2 (PC, PS5 [reviewed], Xbox Series X/S)
Developer: Remedy Entertainment
Publisher: Epic Games Publishing…
articles.title: Review in Progress: Alan Wake 2

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Snappy roguelite Ninja or Die: Shadow of the Sun first hit PC in August, and now it's set to dash and slash to Nintendo Switch next week.


Marvelous Europe unveiled plans for the Switch launch, which is locked in for November 1, 2023 around the world. The simplified action from developer Nao Games will be available on the Nintendo eShop for $14.99. Pre-order and you'll get 10 percent off. Beyond its roguelite stylings, the main hooks for Ninja or Die are its speed and one-button controls. As detailed way back when we first took a look at it, you jump to where you point and slash through foes. 


You can see a very brief sample in Marvelous Europe's announcement.




Ninja nonsense


The story of Ninja or Die has you taking on the role of a pickpocket who becomes a deadly, lightning-fast ninja. The cataclysm that caused this change also turned the ramen seller into a samurai and the maiko into a lethal geisha. Now everyone finds themselves trapped in a chaotic loop. That's where the roguelite aspects come into play. Death can be overcome with the help of permanent upgrades and stat boosts at your village. 


With its focus on replayability, Ninja or Die might end up being a solid fit for Switch. It's a tough entry in the sub-genre that lives up to its speedy claims. We'll see how repeat runs pan out on Nintendo's console when the ninja world unfolds before us very soon. 

The post Ninja or Die brings simplified roguelite action to Switch on November 1 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Ninja or Die brings simplified roguelite action to Switch on November 1

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:

The biggest feature is probably the new UI. I don't have VR, but looking…
